s3194: Year 7: Five stones fell. Six phoenixes retreated flying, passed over our capital.
s3366: Year 10: Xiao Gong died; younger brother Pan, because of Wei Gongzi Kai Fang, killed Xiao Gong's son and established Pan.
s3367: Year 4: Saved Song; repaid the shame of Cao and Wei.
s3369: Year 39: Sent Zi Yu to attack Song.
s3370: Year 4: Chu attacked us; we reported emergency to Jin.
s3380: Year 20: The king hunted at He Yang.
s3381: Year 28: The duke went to Jian Tu for audience.
s3382: Qi Zhao Gong Pan, first year. Assembled Jin defeated Chu, courted Zhou king.
s3383: Year 5: Invaded Cao attacked Wei, took Wu Lu, seized Cao Bo. Feudal lords defeated Chu and courted He Yang; Zhou command granted duke land.
s3384: Year 28: Assembled Jin attacked Chu courted Zhou.
s3385: Year 40: Jin defeated Zi Yu at Cheng Pu.
s3386: Year 5: Jin saved us; Chu troops left.
s3387: Year 3: Jin attacked us, took Wu Lu. Duke fled; established Gongzi Xia assembled Jin courted, returned to Wei.
s3388: Year 16: Assembled Jin attacked Chu, courted Zhou king.
s3389: Year 14: Assembled Jin attacked Chu, courted Zhou king.
s3390: Year 21: Jin attacked us, seized duke, returned him.
s3403: Year 4: Jin allied Wei with Song.
s3415: Year 7: Heard Zhou returned Wei Cheng Gong. Together with Qin surrounded Zheng.
s3416: Year 30: Surrounded Zheng; when spoken to, left.
s3419: Year 5: Zhou installed Cheng Gong, restored Wei.
s3423: Year 43: Qin and Jin surrounded us, because of Jin.
s3448: Year 32: Was about to raid Zheng; Jian Shu said it was not possible.
